title: Meet error when running the getting started code, in deploy-the-l1-contracts section
body:
Hello, 

I follow the getting start doc this section https://stack.optimism.io/docs/build/getting-started/#deploy-the-l1-contracts, I tried server times to get the new salt, but seems not the reason.

I use the WSL Ubuntu22 of windows, but I think maybe it's not the OS problem. 

# Here is my version
(base) freshield@freshield:~/optimism/packages/contracts-bedrock$ ./scripts/getting-started/versions.sh
Dependency | Minimum | Actual
git          2         2.34.1
go           1.21      1.21.4
node         20        20.10.0
pnpm         8         8.11.0
foundry      0.2.0     0.2.0
make         3         4.3
jq           1.6       1.6
direnv       2         2.25.2

# And here is the output log, in the console it end with script failed: no data. Here is the logs part, and detail as the attachment
